businessProfile.name: Avellino's Pizzeria & Catering
businessProfile.address: 279 Nassau Blvd, Garden City South, NY 11530, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 279 Nassau Blvd, Garden City South, NY 11530, USA

reviews.text: Very small place. Don‚Äôt have a lot of pizza variety. Got 2 slices of plain pizza. Person charged me $7.00 and didn‚Äôt even warm the pizza. Service is bad. Pizza was extremely dry. Will not go back there.
We LOVE Avellinos! My family and I order from here every week! Best pizza spot in town!

Great pizzeria! Super fair prices, definitely delicious and authentic Italian food. The owner is also a really good guy who gave us free slices when we left. If you‚Äôre in the area, you should definitely check them out!
We love the cauliflower crust pizza. Get it margherita style with grilled chicken on top. Great!

Avellion's pizza is delicous. My husband is a pizza snob and we found Avellino's and he has been loving it. We used them for an event and they were able to deliver the pizzas to the Garden City Mini Golf Course and everything was perfect. They were on time, the pizza tasted great and great customer service. Will definitely be using them again.

editorial_summary.overview: Neighborhood pizza parlor offering Italian dishes along with hot & cold sandwiches & house specials.

detailedReviews.author: Elliot C
detailedReviews.text: Quite possibly the worst pizza I‚Äôve ever had.  Scammed me $8.50 for one slice and a warm Diet Coke.  Avoid.

detailedReviews.author: Martha Daly
detailedReviews.text: We love Avellinos!!! The food is consistently good!! We order Avellino's on the regular. It really is very good üòã

detailedReviews.author: Alicia Seitz
detailedReviews.text: We recently had a luncheon in our unit to celebrate one of our nurses on her retirement. The food was amazing and of the best quality: Cesar salad, sausage and peppers, chicken Parmesan, penne a la vodka, garlic knots, and the best meatballs ever! Everything came fresh and just delish! I'll be ordering for my own family  gatherings!

detailedReviews.author: Raquel Prescott
detailedReviews.text: I used to come here all the time when I was in college. Now when I visit home, I always try to stop by for a meal. Excellent food and great team.

detailedReviews.author: Faryal Chaudhry
detailedReviews.text: Very small place. Don‚Äôt have a lot of pizza variety. Got 2 slices of plain pizza. Person charged me $7.00 and didn‚Äôt even warm the pizza. Service is bad. Pizza was extremely dry. Will not go back there.

detailedReviews.author: nicole kohner
detailedReviews.text: Just ordered a wide range of food and it‚Äôs great. Three kids all agree, ‚Äúit‚Äôs really good.‚Äù Definitely order from here. Also the owner is super nice and on premise!!

detailedReviews.author: Kristine Lahey
detailedReviews.text: Order from Avellinos all the time and they never disappoint. There food and pizza are the best in town

detailedReviews.author: Balram Blaze
detailedReviews.text: Long Island pizza at its finest. üòòüçï

detailedReviews.text: Joe is great.  The catering special was an excellent value. The food came hot and was delicious. Thanks!  Will return.

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Martucci

detailedReviews.author: N. James Morales
detailedReviews.text: Very good deals for extremely good food!

detailedReviews.author: Kathy Madronero
detailedReviews.text: I catered from here for my graduation party. Everything was amazing, all my guests loved the food and asked me where the food was from. We got the food delivered and the guy who came to deliver the food set up everything on the serving table and turned on the gel chafing fuel for us as my dad drank his beer and I was inside getting ready. Thank you so much :)

detailedReviews.author: Jean Treglia
detailedReviews.text: Got the Sunday special.  Food is good but it does not serve 6-8 people unless your family eats like birds which my does not.  More like serves 4-5. :)

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Pollack
detailedReviews.text: Pizza made me feel sick. There are too many good pizza places around to mess with this place ever again.

detailedReviews.author: Michael P. D'Elia

detailedReviews.author: Michael Giannikios

Got a house slice(regular) and tasted like it had been there all day.
And was cold
Garlic nots were hard and dry

detailedReviews.author: Joe L
detailedReviews.text: I love this restaurant. They have delicious Italian food. They have catered some parties for me. My guests loved it. Thank u Avellinos!

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Nixon
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food!  Taste of üáÆüáπ Italy in NY!  Such a wonderful experience from the staff to the food!  A must have in our community!

detailedReviews.author: Dianna Quinonez
detailedReviews.text: They make the cauliflower pizza taste like a real regular slice I was in disbelief were I called the store to make sure since I am gluten intolerant. Awesome pizza !

detailedReviews.author: Rod Cooney
detailedReviews.text: Very nice local Pizza place. Very limited seat in area,however expected. Great 2 for tuesday specials...food is very good..chix parm hero was great..specialty pizza..and pepperoni garlic knots.wow.

detailedReviews.author: Alberto Alvarado
detailedReviews.text: Very good food and pizza. I recommend penne alla vodka with grilled chicken and riceball avellino'süí•üí•üí•

detailedReviews.author: No Name
detailedReviews.text: I'd give this place minus five stars if I could.  How can you screw up basic Italian food?  Dried out chicken wings, mixed up orders . . . incredible. They consistently overcharge because their  staff can't calculate the taxes correctly, much less accurately add up the bill.  And as for their "specials," they search for every possible way to refuse to honor them.  This has not been a one-time occurrence.  There are a million cheap pizzerias to patronize, but this is not one of them.  Basta!

detailedReviews.author: Joe L
detailedReviews.text: We love avellinos restaurant. We always have our parties catered by them. The food is delicious. Friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: Nicholas Pena
detailedReviews.text: Prices are cheap but you can tell the ingredients are very low quality. You might as well spend a little bit more money for much better pizza somewhere else.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Hannigan
detailedReviews.text: Thank you Joe,  your generousity and support of our Public Safety Officers is truly appreciated. Your food is delicious.  Your community support needs to be commended.

detailedReviews.author: michael heffez
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town. Tried for the first time. Had the Sicilian which was delish and the Chicago style which was over the top delish!!! You can really see that they use VERY HIGH quality ingredients. Can‚Äôt wait to go back.

detailedReviews.author: Carolyn Ricca
detailedReviews.text: This place is the best! The food is always delicious. The owner Joe and staff are so helpful and go above and beyond to make sure you have a good experience. Highly recommended!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Goodheart
detailedReviews.text: This place had good pizza, on and off, mostly on.

detailedReviews.author: Solomon Roy
detailedReviews.text: Ambience is lackluster and pizza is subpar at best. Prices are absolutely unreasonable for the quality. Tables are kept unclean and workers have a bad attitude. Avoid at all cost if possible. Would much rather prefer going to Rustica‚Äôs down the street

Chicken Rollatini was a excellent choice!
Tortellini was just as DELICIOUS

detailedReviews.text: Great local pizza, friendly staff, good choice of TV channels in the background. Great place, definitely my go-to local Italian/Pizza spot.

detailedReviews.author: Munpreet Puar
detailedReviews.text: Incredibly unprofessional & rude when ordering. I don‚Äôt care if you have a lemonade stand, know how to be professional if you want a business that lasts!

detailedReviews.author: Atiq Choudry
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza great people

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Giacini
detailedReviews.text: Skimpy establishment

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Ardzivian
detailedReviews.text: Always order from them. Great pizza and pasta. They have the BEST garlic knots.

detailedReviews.author: Marisol Pantoja
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is very good.

detailedReviews.author: mary bruschi
detailedReviews.text:
Fantastic catering package! I am very picky when it comes to food and I typically cook for all my parties! This time I gave Avellino Pizzeria a try and I was not disappointed! The complete catering package includes two grandma pies, rice balls, garlic knots, French bread and your choice of three large trays of pastas; chicken, sausages or eggplant. I ordered penne all a vodka, chicken Francesca, and sausage and peppers. Every entree was delicious and fresh, as well as the pizza and rice balls! I make my own rice balls are these were impressive! They also added extra containers of vodka sauce and marinara , as well as grated cheese!
The delivery service was reliable and prompt and the driver set up all the sternis so I didn‚Äôt have to do a thing!
I would definitely recommend Avellino‚Äôs Pizzeria the next time you cater a party - my guests all complimented the food and best of all the price was right ... and I have leftovers!!!

detailedReviews.author: Lc Adelphi
detailedReviews.text: Catered for a group of 100 people last weekend!  They loved it!  Meatballs, stuffed shells and chicken parm were a hit!  Joe, the owner, was extremely friendly and helpful!

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Shorty73
detailedReviews.text: This is the first time that I've had their Pizza it is freaking delicious ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

detailedReviews.author: Mike Rochat
detailedReviews.text: Friendly staff, good food. You can tell they don't try to use cheap ingredients.

detailedReviews.author: Katya G
detailedReviews.text: Great place, tasty food, but sometimes they can be a little rude.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.3/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Avellinos is praised for consistently delicious pizza, with customers frequently ordering and recommending it as the best in town. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The prompt and professional delivery service ensures that takeout orders are always on time and meet customer expectations. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The exceptional customer service, including friendly staff and thoughtful gestures like free slices, leaves a lasting impression on customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews/reputation issues regarding food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and poor customer service - social media marketing can improve this area
Competition/discovery issues with nearby pizzerias - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
